info.title: QRSong! Reseller API
info.description:
API for third-party resellers to create card orders and download printer PDFs.

## Authentication
All endpoints require an API key passed as a Bearer token:
```
Authorization: Bearer rk_your_api_key_here
```

## Workflow
1. **Upload media** (optional) - Upload background/logo images via `POST /reseller/media/upload`
2. **Create order** - Submit a playlist URL + design JSON via `POST /reseller/orders`
3. **Poll for status** - Check order progress via `GET /reseller/orders/:orderId` until status is `done`
4. **Download PDF** - Use the `pdfUrl` from the status response to download the printer-ready PDF

## Design JSON
The `design` object controls the visual appearance of the cards. Key concepts:
- **Front side**: The side with the QR code and optional logo
- **Back side**: The side with the track name, artist, and year
- **Media IDs**: Upload images first, then reference them by their returned `mediaId` (integer)
- **Colors**: All colors are CSS hex strings (e.g. `#ff0000`)
- **Gradients**: Optional gradient overlays on front/back with configurable angle and position

post.description: Upload a background, back background, or logo image for use in card designs. Send as `multipart/form-data` with an `image` file field and a `type` text field. Returns a `mediaId` that can be referenced in the design JSON when creating orders.

mediaId.description: Use this ID in the design JSON when creating orders.

post.description:
Fetch playlist metadata and track listing from a music service URL. Use this to validate a playlist and display its contents before placing an order.

Supported music services: Spotify, YouTube Music, Apple Music, Deezer, Tidal.

playlistUrl.description: Full URL of a playlist from any supported music service.

post.description:
Create a physical card order from a music playlist URL. The order is processed asynchronously - poll `GET /reseller/orders/:orderId` to track progress and get the printer PDF URL when done.

Supported music services: Spotify, YouTube Music, Apple Music, Deezer, Tidal.

playlistUrl.description: Full URL of a playlist from any supported music service (e.g. https://open.spotify.com/playlist/5WxLJfgeVeifVtyX0cIFZY).

serviceType.description: Music service type. Auto-detected from the URL if not provided.

design.description: Card design configuration. Image fields (background, backgroundBack, logo) accept either a numeric media ID (from /reseller/media/upload) or a filename string.

background.description: Front background image. Pass a media ID (integer from upload endpoint, type=background) or a filename string. Leave empty for solid color.

backgroundBack.description: Back background image. Pass a media ID (integer from upload endpoint, type=background_back) or a filename string. Leave empty for solid color.

logo.description: Logo image overlaid on the front of the card. Pass a media ID (integer from upload endpoint, type=logo) or a filename string.

backgroundFrontType.description: Front background type. "image" uses the background image, "solid" uses backgroundFrontColor.

backgroundFrontColor.description: Solid color for the front background (used when backgroundFrontType is "solid").

useFrontGradient.description: Enable gradient overlay on the front side.

gradientFrontColor.description: Second color for the front gradient.

gradientFrontDegrees.description: Gradient angle in degrees for the front side.

gradientFrontPosition.description: Gradient color stop position (0-100) for the front side.

frontOpacity.description: Front background image opacity (0 = transparent, 100 = fully visible).

backgroundBackType.description: Back background type. "image" uses the backgroundBack image, "solid" uses backgroundBackColor.

backgroundBackColor.description: Solid color for the back background (used when backgroundBackType is "solid").

fontColor.description: Text color for the back side (track name, artist, year).

useGradient.description: Enable gradient overlay on the back side.

gradientBackgroundColor.description: Second color for the back gradient.

gradientDegrees.description: Gradient angle in degrees for the back side.

gradientPosition.description: Gradient color stop position (0-100) for the back side.

backOpacity.description: Back background image opacity (0 = transparent, 100 = fully visible).

qrColor.description: Color of the QR code dots.

qrBackgroundColor.description: Background color of the QR code area.

qrBackgroundType.description: Shape of the background behind the QR code. "none" for transparent, "circle" or "square" for a colored shape.

hideCircle.description: Legacy field. When true, sets qrBackgroundType to "none".

selectedFont.description: Google Font name for the back side text (e.g. "Oswald", "Caveat"). Leave empty for Arial. See GET /reseller/fonts for available options.

selectedFontSize.description: CSS font size for the back side text.

get.description:
Poll this endpoint to check order progress. Status transitions:

- **processing** - PDF is being generated
- **finalizing** - PDF generation almost complete
- **done** - PDF is ready, `pdfUrl` is included
- **failed** - Order failed

Recommended polling interval: every 5-10 seconds.

pdfUrl.description: URL to download the printer-ready PDF. Only present when status is "done".

post.description: Generate a preview URL to visualize a card design before creating an order. The preview shows the front and back of the card with the specified design settings. Preview URLs expire after 24 hours.

design.description: Card design configuration. Image fields (background, backgroundBack, logo) accept either a numeric media ID (from /reseller/media/upload) or a filename string.

background.description: Front background image. Pass a media ID (integer from upload endpoint, type=background) or a filename string. Leave empty for solid color.

backgroundBack.description: Back background image. Pass a media ID (integer from upload endpoint, type=background_back) or a filename string. Leave empty for solid color.

logo.description: Logo image overlaid on the front of the card. Pass a media ID (integer from upload endpoint, type=logo) or a filename string.

backgroundFrontType.description: Front background type. "image" uses the background image, "solid" uses backgroundFrontColor.

backgroundFrontColor.description: Solid color for the front background (used when backgroundFrontType is "solid").

useFrontGradient.description: Enable gradient overlay on the front side.

gradientFrontColor.description: Second color for the front gradient.

gradientFrontDegrees.description: Gradient angle in degrees for the front side.

gradientFrontPosition.description: Gradient color stop position (0-100) for the front side.

frontOpacity.description: Front background image opacity (0 = transparent, 100 = fully visible).

backgroundBackType.description: Back background type. "image" uses the backgroundBack image, "solid" uses backgroundBackColor.

backgroundBackColor.description: Solid color for the back background (used when backgroundBackType is "solid").

fontColor.description: Text color for the back side (track name, artist, year).

useGradient.description: Enable gradient overlay on the back side.

gradientBackgroundColor.description: Second color for the back gradient.

gradientDegrees.description: Gradient angle in degrees for the back side.

gradientPosition.description: Gradient color stop position (0-100) for the back side.

backOpacity.description: Back background image opacity (0 = transparent, 100 = fully visible).

qrColor.description: Color of the QR code dots.

qrBackgroundColor.description: Background color of the QR code area.

qrBackgroundType.description: Shape of the background behind the QR code. "none" for transparent, "circle" or "square" for a colored shape.

hideCircle.description: Legacy field. When true, sets qrBackgroundType to "none".

selectedFont.description: Google Font name for the back side text (e.g. "Oswald", "Caveat"). Leave empty for Arial. See GET /reseller/fonts for available options.

selectedFontSize.description: CSS font size for the back side text.

sampleTrackName.description: Track name displayed on the back side of the preview card.

sampleTrackArtist.description: Artist name displayed on the back side of the preview card.

sampleTrackYear.description: Year displayed on the back side of the preview card.

previewUrlFront.description: URL to view the front side of the card preview.

previewUrlBack.description: URL to view the back side of the card preview.

token.description: Preview token (can also be used with GET /reseller/preview/:token).

get.description: Retrieve the design data for a preview. This endpoint is public (no authentication required) and is used by the frontend to render the card preview page. Returns 404 if the token has expired.

data.description: The resolved design JSON with full image URLs and sample track data.

get.description: Returns all available fonts that can be used in the `design.selectedFont` field when creating orders. Pass the `googleFontName` value as `design.selectedFont`. Use an empty string for the default font (Arial).

id.description: Value to use in design.selectedFont (empty string = Arial).

get.description: Returns all available preset background images that can be used in card designs. Each background includes full URLs to the thumbnail and full-size image, plus a `mediaId` that can be passed directly as `design.background` or `design.backgroundBack` when creating orders.

mediaId.description: Media ID usable in design.background or design.backgroundBack when creating orders.

thumbnail.description: Full URL to the thumbnail image (150x150px).

full.description: Full URL to the background image (1000x1000px).

tags.name: Backgrounds
tags.description: Available preset background images for card designs

tags.name: Fonts
tags.description: Available font options for card designs

tags.name: Playlist
tags.description: Fetch playlist info and tracks from a music service URL
